name: A.P. (DIR Series) Circular No.31
summary: This circular reviews and modifies regulations for Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPI) investments in debt instruments. It introduces changes to minimum residual maturity requirements, revises security-wise limits, establishes online monitoring systems, and sets concentration limits for FPI investments. Key changes include allowing FPIs to invest in government securities without minimum residual maturity requirements, setting a 30% cap on short-term investments, and establishing new concentration limits for different categories of FPIs. The circular also addresses single/group investor-wise limits in corporate bonds and provides guidelines for pipeline investments.
